name: Elkmire-Hiereth
description:
This was a grey box of a game I made in my Bachelor of Games Design at SAE. The concept is your an adventurer who has been asked to defeat the dragon threatening the kingdom of Elkmire. To do so you must first collect the ancient armour in the dungeon Labyrinth. once you have the ancient armour and sword, you must then travel to the Dragons Lair and defeat the Dragon. 

there was going to be a more in-depth storyline but I ran out of time in submission and left it as is.
